member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.zlibCompress(void,size_t,void,size_t,bool)
member.summary: Compresses the source data using the Zlib algorithm with the specified compression level and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.param: Compression quality; false is for faster compression, true is for higher compression (less size).
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.zlibDecompress(void,size_t,void,size_t)
member.summary: Decompresses the source data using the Zlib algorithm and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.zlibSize(size_t)
member.summary: Returns the maximum Zlib-compressed data size for the specified uncompressed size value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.lz4Size(size_t)
member.summary: Returns the maximum LZ4-compressed data size for the specified uncompressed size value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.lz4Compress(void,size_t,void,size_t,bool)
member.summary: Compresses the source data using the LZ4 algorithm with the specified compression level and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.param: Compression quality; false is for faster compression, true is for higher compression (less size).
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.lz4Decompress(void,size_t,void,size_t)
member.summary: Decompresses the source data using the LZ4 algorithm and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessSize(size_t)
member.summary: Returns the maximum size of data compressed using jackalless method for the specified uncompressed size value.
member.returns: Maximum size of data compressed using jackalless method.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessCompress(void,size_t,void,size_t)
member.summary: Compresses the source data using jackalless method and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessDecompress(void,void)
member.summary: Decompresses the source data using jackalless method and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessCompressFloat(void,size_t,float,size_t)
member.summary: Compresses the source data using jackalless method and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessDecompressFloat(float,size_t,void)
member.summary: Decompresses the source data using jackalless method and puts the result to the specified destination.
member.returns: true if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessRawSize(void)
member.summary: Returns the raw size of the compressed data.

member.name: M:Unigine.Compress.jackallessCompressedSize(void)
member.summary: Returns the compressed size of the compressed data.
